values: if you want to figure out what the hell it is that i'm doing here, go look at this post from my bf, . same deal. if you've seen a comment posted by me, most likely it's because i forgot to switch accounts on livejournal. :) if you want to check my real, regular lj, see .

yeah i havent posted in a long time. i'm a loser <3

i got my first perfect game against sarge. whooo!! i'm so proud. i got an "accuracy" thing too which isnt anything new on this map but.. i'm still excited cuz it was 72%!!!! chris will be proud.

maybe i will win ggl next year.

lol?

i just played a few games of quake.. first one i lost. 2nd, i beat ranger by like 1 frag (i was down by 4, he was at 9 and i then came back to win!).. then i reset my demo bind and recorded the last game, which i won by 4 frags i think! :O

i made a conscious effort to strafe (it's hard to remember..) and to aim lower w/rl but i *was* playing better than i did yesterday.. yayy!!

i cant wait to go over this demo w/chris tonight.

you know, fuck lj. christ. i'm not writing this entry all out again. here it is, bulleted (HAHA FUNNY UNINTENTIONAL PUN)

. chris showed me around q3dm1 last nite
. i played bot ranger today on 'hurt me plenty'
. warmed up, beat him once, then recorded demo
. watched it with chris
. good points (word for word from chris):
    . good basic rules of engagement (no charging w/o a health advantage, etc)
    . good awareness of item status
    . good prediction aiming technique
. bad points:
    . poor movement (need to use strafe more often to navigate the map better)
    . poor enemy awareness
    . poor rl technique (need to focus on splash damage more)

thats it. if this fucker doesnt post, oh well. :P
